website_summaries.verdict: A great monitor if you're looking for something that's quick and easy to set up.
pros: Easy to follow step-by-step setup instructions
cons: Has problems connecting to some routers

customer_reviews.title: App has adware now
customer_reviews.text: We have used this camera for years as a baby monitor but I’m done with it. They added an annoying cloud storage add to the iPhone app which cannot be removed. Just replaced with two Wyze cameras today which have much better night vision and no ads in the app.
customer_reviews.author: J1976

customer_reviews.title: Was great!
customer_reviews.text: Until it out of nowhere stopped connecting to the router. So basically it’s useless now. Which is a real bummer, because we initially loved this as a monitor for our son. I’ve tried to reconnect it literally over 20 times. Unplugged. Reset. Gotten closer to the router. Deleted and downloaded the app. NOTHING will work. Doesn’t make sense.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love the clarity and all the features it has. Two way talk, night vision, motion detection, cloud storage, I synced this to my computer, phone, tablet, and Alexa Show. It functions best as an app than on the computer or Echo Show. I like it so much, I've ordered it for another room and plan on ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Was a pain to set up initially but easy to operate after that. Goes offline frequently and unable to get back online without unplugging it, doesnt recognize memory cards are in it and have to remove them and re-install (happened with two cards). Dont count on it for much more than while you're gone for work, if that. Almost every time that I go on a work trip it's broken in some fashion before I return. Would not buy again or recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera two years ago to monitor our infant granddaughter when she’s visiting and have recently purchased a second camera for the same purpose with her new baby brother. The system is updated regularly via WiFi and we have had no problems with the product. Great visual and audio clarity. I highly recommend this camera for a variety of applications. I was surprised to discover that we can access and view while on vacation 125 miles away.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my third camera and the newest models work better then the older versions. The updates work well. Install can be tricky at times connecting to WiFi. Years ago I lost connection all the time but seems to have fixed the issue and works fine for over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great price, surprisingly perfect
customer_reviews.text: For the price, we LOOOOOVE this camera! It has night vision, a microphone to listen and speak to my child, mobility with just a scroll of my finger, the ability to record a video or take a picture, and it's pretty easy to set up without "expert assembly"! Only con is that the camera feels cheap - the plastic doesn't feel very durable - however, it has lasted us over 2 years even with our baby messing with the camera when he got tall enough to stand up and grab it off the wall...
customer_reviews.author: mauricio rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely TERRIBLE! The quality of picture is decent when and IF the product decides it wants to work; which is NEVER! It’s consistently kicking me offline and promoting me to do diagnosis and to send report but NOTHING is getting fixed. Tried to email the company with NO RESPONSE! Extremely dissatisfied customer! I would never reorder and would NOT recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this camera for $29.99 + tax. For what this camera does, it should be well into the $200 range. It has an app for viewing on your phone, 2 way voice, pan and tilt, night vision, and ability to record. When talking into your phone, it lags a few moments before coming out of the camera. The voice coming out of the camera isn’t always so clear, so speaking a little slower is a must. It has mounting capabilities, and can also serve as outside surveillance. It was a great buy! I intend on buying more before the price goes to high.
customer_reviews.author: squirrel

customer_reviews.text: I settled for this, since i wasn’t a fan of baby monitors. But honestly , i think a baby monitor will be good. At times the camera will lose connection & it takes a while to load on your app. You can have it on your computer or ipad & phone. Also the motion detector can be a tough one to mess around with. If you have it too high every little detail will be detected, too low, you won’t get notifications that your kids are moving lol . Other than that, i had it for over a year. I still use it& i like it. I would recommend to anyone who wants something temporary, not permanent
customer_reviews.author: Adilene Torres

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this in exchange for a $300 baby monitor and it works better!!! we have saved so much money on this camera! you are able to do everything you will need, watch the camera on your phone, move the camera with your phone, talk to it, night vision is great!, record, and download videos, image is great too! i love this camera so much!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi Bolanos

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these, one stopped working altogether, can't get it to re-connect. The software stopped working, had to re-install, then was unable to connect cameras using app on phone so I had to download on the ipad to get the cameras connected and now I can no longer use the speaker function. It isn't compatible with any other software, so I have to get by with what I have.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Gawehn

customer_reviews.title: easy setup, and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Had 3 of this camera already. One for each room and one for front door. Had little trouble hiding the power adapter and the cable, but it could be setup near any outlet, just plug it in . What I like about it is 2 way speaker function. I can check on my kid when I was at work, I would talk to them when I see them sit too close to tv or playing games! The speaker is louder than I thought! The images is great on iPhone 7, and tilt left right or up and down just as easy as touching the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Dong

customer_reviews.title: Works with Chrome Browser
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a LeFun camera as a baby monitor for a couple of years, now that my daughter is moving into her own room we got another one. I tried 3 other cameras and non of them played well with Chrome Browser. I no longer have a smart phone, and when I did I didn't want to tie it up with the camera app. It is important to me to be able to pull the camera up on my Chromebook. the other three couldn't do it, so I bought another LeFun. Now I can watch both cameras at the same time. and relax while they nap.
customer_reviews.author: GrammarGeek

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this been using it for a year and decided to review it. It loses connection often and is hard to connect. It never once told me the motion was detected. The saving of videos during the day costs money so I have to watch 24/7 to know what’s going on. It’s good but I will def be upgrading soon probably to the ring indoor cam
customer_reviews.author: Jen Gambuti

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera if you don't have to use it 24/7. I use it as a baby monitor and it's kind of a pain to set up. You have to have 2 g wifi or it will not connect. The app crashes on your phone/ tablet while I sleep so I have to use an audio monitor too. The motion detection is WAY too sensitive. I'm not sure if my house is haunted or something but it goes off every few minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this camera for about a year and a half. It can be a pain to set up but overall this works pretty well. It is important to have good WiFi and internet with this device. Occasionally the camera connection will fail despite our internet working fine but it’s not often that this happens.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Still a good product during the day
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted one for my baby shower and bought another one off of here when I had my second baby I moved my first baby into the nursery the night vision does not work it shows picture but it's in black and white at night my other one goes into night vision mode and everything is still in color and not pixelated I don't know why this one isn't working right
customer_reviews.author: Nyomie&Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price when the app is working. Our app goes out more often than I would like. Our internet also goes in and out so that gives us some trouble but for the price these work great for us. Especially if you need multiple cameras as we do. We use them for baby monitors and have 4. I don't like that you can't do split screen.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly cool
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this more than a year. We live very remote so WiFi is questionable at times, but it always manages to find that signal and work. I can look in on my dogs from anywhere. It swivels really well and far. You can enlarge the pic. You can speak to your dog or listen in. For the price this a pretty cool dog cam.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this camera! Bought it to monitor my puppy. The picture is clear even when on the night vision setting. There is a second delay when moving the camera angle but that’s to be expected. It was simple to setup as long as you have the right equipment. I will be purchasing another one to monitor other rooms in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Inexpensive camera!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera to check in on our pets while we are at work. Very simple set up and user friendly app! I am able to see the camera feed live, take photos and speak through the microphone. Alert system seems to be a bit off but overall very happy with this purchase. Recommended to all pets owners out there!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the worst user experience on the market
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this for any reason. There are so many options on the market there is no reason. I was given this device to test out and while I appreciate that, I can not in good conscious recommend to anyone, especially not for the price. The app is horribly difficult to navigate and connecting the camera is a giant pain. Once you finally get it to work the quality isn't too shabby but trying to use the app to monitor things is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: ataleb52

customer_reviews.title: Not bad to watch the dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could keep an eye on my dogs and see which one likes to destroy my house. This is my first day using it and so far, no issues. I can't hear sounds from the other end but I do like how I can control the camera angle via phone. I had a hard time setting it up to WiFi so we had to do it via ethernet cable and setup on the computer, not the phone. So far no problems. Good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Device offline....
customer_reviews.text: It goes "offline" constantly. We deal with it by having a sound monitor too but it's stupid to have to buy 2 different monitors. I like the quality and the fact that I can see my baby when I am at work or not home for the night. But this one is not the one to get for reliable monitoring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these cameras in my house. I will get more but I need to be able to buy replacement parts. Ie. The power cord and mounting pieces. I don't see anywhere that I can order them. That would make this an even better item. We've lost stuff in our move and would like to get them hooked back up asap.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Poor Night Mode
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 LeFun cameras. After 1 year the quality of the night mode on 3 of the cameras degraded to a point where the face of a person at night is not recognizable. I followed the typical troubleshooting that IR cameras encounter to no avail (reset the factory settings, clean the camera, make sure it's not pointing to shiny objects...) The one camera that still has a decent night mode unfortunately is no longer able to communicate via WiFi and can only be on the network when connected to an Ethernet cable.
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: Major connectivity issues!
customer_reviews.text: These Camera’s have MASSIVE issues when it comes to connecting to the WiFi. What a crappy product. DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA EVER!!!!!!!!!! If you care about your mental health, do not buy this camera. Because it will make you go crazy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 360 view
customer_reviews.text: I got ordered mine for my daughters room and mine for when she naps or when I'm not home and maintenance comes by. I love the night vision and the 360 rotation. I can move the camera around the room while I'm out. The motion detection is a little to sensitvie as it goes off with voices from the other room. It's so easy to install. I recommend to alot of my friends for their newborns.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, uses an app on your phone to view and you can listen or talk to space your viewing. You can't tell when others are viewing through the camera though unless they tell you, which is a little creepy. It does sometimes need to be reset, not extremely often, but more than I would prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Cucumber Service
customer_reviews.text: I am not able to contact their customer service! I have emailed them a couple of times and didn’t get any answer! And there is no phone number to call!!!! I am so angry! I bought 3 of these for my daycare and used them for 3 months and they were perfect! We moved and I closed my daycare! Didn’t use them for a while. Used them again for watching my cats during a trip. It worked. Wanted to go to another trip and they wouldn’t work without being connected to the router with cable. I need to solve it and they don’t contact me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Nael Amzajerdi

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. The app is s little clunky and setting it up was a challenge but it works fine. The motion detection is too sensitive so it goes off when shadows move. It makes that feature basically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Katie K

customer_reviews.title: No monthly fee
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these cameras set up is a little bit challenging but once you get them set up a Work really well. The nicest part about them is you have no monthly fees and you can view the cameras as long as you have them hooked up to Internet remotely
customer_reviews.author: outoftheboxdavid

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This makes so much noise when you move the camera. It lags and the quality of the camera is horrendous. I can't even make out my baby's body most of the time. I bought the protection plan and they still have not gotten back to me. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: Not easy or great!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think the software is easy to setup with this and saving videos to the microsd Card is a limited format. Going through a “3rd party” server to view your video in real time is not always the best and gets glitchy if their servers are acting up. I’d go with something else at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Ktrader

customer_reviews.title: I have three of these
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these as they are amazing and work perfectly for bedrooms and our living room. We use it as a nanny cam and just to keep an eye on our house. Love being able to check on our house from anywhere. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Allie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Meh..if you cant afford anything else
customer_reviews.text: Works until it doesnt. Sometimes disconnects for ni rrason and requires someone to physically unplug and replug the camera. Not convenient when you would like to look into your property.
customer_reviews.author: DarthUnderhill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for checking in on pets
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. The picture is clean and night vision is good. We bought it too keep an eye on the house and our pets when we go out for a bit and have never had a problem connecting too it. The voice feature is neat too.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: I love these.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first one so much that I bought a second one. Have one in our living room and one in our kitchen. Got them to keep an eye on our dogs when we are out of the house. I love that I can pan the room, zoom in & out, listen to the dogs and also talk to the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kime

customer_reviews.title: Awful wireless camera and the worst app ever
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to say what I don’t dislike. This is the worst wireless camera ever. The app for it is even worse. It constantly goes offline and has to be reset. I have had to reset it atleast 10 times already and it never wirelessly connects so I have to physically plug it into the router to connect and set it up all over again. Don’t waste your time, it’s not worth the hassle. I tried the cheap route and I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: in school

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this was docked, when you download the app, it installs over 400 pictures for the manual in your phone, it did this twice for me. You can imagine the frustration of deleting all of them (they are useless)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have set up in my dads room as he has short term memory loss. The picture is great day or night. I can follow completely around his room and speak to him through it via microphone. Expecially when I'm In bed and wants to try and wander. You can set the sensitivity for both day and night for notifications. It was easy to load onto my phone. I am planning on getting a couple more for home security.
customer_reviews.author: loweslakeview

customer_reviews.title: Good simple baby camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister I installed it myself.. for her baby girl.. camera qualities good 720P...application simple to use on the phone.. never really gave me a problem connecting to see the camera
customer_reviews.author: Rayson Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on WiFi
customer_reviews.text: This camera has good quality. But does not work on WiFi ! I’ve had it connected to my Ethernet and now that I moved I can’t even use it because the modem isn’t in the living room , I’m pissed
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Won't connect
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I bought a second one, my first one stopped working. It won't connect to my wifi even though nothing has changed and my new one will connect to the wifi. I contacted them and have heard nothing back. Very unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: B&T

customer_reviews.title: Remote new failure
customer_reviews.text: Seems to not work everytime I'm out of town. Video quality is decent, but didn't do much good when you can keep an eye on things while you're away. Have a dvr I can watch remotely, so it's not a network issue when it happens.
customer_reviews.author: zereoue20

customer_reviews.title: A very useful monitoring camera
customer_reviews.text: I have been using 5 such cameras in two houses located at the other side of the globe, and I am able to keep track of my loved ones remotely from practically any place or country, even when I am at airports or at work!
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Nice cameras and nice price
customer_reviews.text: I love these cameras! I have 4 of them and use them as security cameras in my house and to keep an eye on my pets. I can listen, talk, take pictures. Free app too! Really nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Deb L

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup; easy to use
customer_reviews.text: While we have never received a motion-detection notification, the ability to rotate the camera and use 2 way audio is very useful. The night vision is fairly decent, incredibly decent given the price of this unit (purchased on PrimeDay).
customer_reviews.author: dafan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My son is 16 months old and we’ve been using this since birth. Great quality and great price. Definitely worth it. Love that it’s wifi because we can see him still when we sit on the deck. 100 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Worst
customer_reviews.text: Worst camera ever! I purchased the recommended micro sd card, and every time I want to view the video, it tells me I have to format the SD card. Which I have already done, multiple times. POS, just call ADT and get it done right.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Visual.  Bad sound.
customer_reviews.text: Good for Visual monitoring. However, there is constant static when the speaker is on for listening. Not hard to install on Wi Fi system.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! Have had mine about 3 years. Use it for baby monitoring but also for home security while not home. Have never used the motion detection. Love the two way talk. Thinking about getting another.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Holt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product and lack of customer support
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! This camera is worthless. Grainy picture and constantly have to reboot. Company does not stand behind their product . Takes days if emails , no phone # to contact, to get reply from company. Had to trash monitor just over 1 year after purchase as it would not reset with malfunction. Do not buy from this Chinese company!
customer_reviews.author: Julia D. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Won’t pick up WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Bought it before I needed it as my sister had one. Now it’s past time to return and just found out it won’t work in my house. Will not pick up my WiFi for some reason. Spent 2 hours trying to get it to work for nothing. Bought another like I had and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Slone

customer_reviews.title: It is a pain to connect the camera
customer_reviews.text: The wireless connection is really easy to follow the steps but the camera never connects to the wifi (I did connected to the 2.4 ghz) I stopped using after 2 weeks after I bought it. If disconnected from the power source, all the wireless connection must be made again. I do NOT recommend this camera, there is a YI camera that is way cheaper and works extremely better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: GUSTAVO

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera! Great for the value :)
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture quality and good night vision. The motion detection feature works very good too. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debora B

customer_reviews.title: When you access from a phone picture is very good
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my partner and he I talked it to check on his dog during his hours at work. Nice quality pictures and has a wide angle range
customer_reviews.author: JJ Hill

customer_reviews.title: for everything
customer_reviews.text: i love it and help me watch my daughter when she is sleeping and more other things
customer_reviews.author: johany

customer_reviews.title: Does not display/record in color
customer_reviews.text: Invest in a better device. This one is good but doesn’t display in color. I sent emails to support team to see why this is happening and still waiting for a response.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works after few years
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a few years and it still works well. Picture isn’t the best though.
customer_reviews.author: Nadezhda Sr

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare for overnight baby monitoring
customer_reviews.text: In spite of 35 M internet the signal is frequently lost and does not reconnect automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Sandro Albuquerque

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I personally was not a fan of this I still have it but honestly it just wasn’t what I expected it makes an obnoxious beeping noise if I even go into view it from my phone, and I was trying to keep it “hidden” from the babysitter and with the beeping well that kind of ruined the point. Plus it has a super glowing red light around the camera and for night timet daughter was no way sleeping with this red light on her.. I personally didn’t like it
customer_reviews.author: Janedoe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The software for this camera is horrible. It always says the network cannot be found.
customer_reviews.author: sassafrass

customer_reviews.title: Good baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a baby monitor. It does have a little bit of a lag when you move the camera or talk through it. It is a good affordable camera.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph &Hailey Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This camera works so much better than another one we had. It was easy to set up and it doesn’t take long to load the camera! Good packing and got here quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Rios

customer_reviews.title: Offline
customer_reviews.text: Keeps going offline after a day or so. Have one I bought six months ago and works fine same brand style and all. Very upset Update. Still does not start online
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: This camera works well, but it's always updating and making high pitch sounds and doesnt work all the time
customer_reviews.author: Adonis v.y

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Controls are responsive. Slight delay with audio but that is to be expected. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after a few months and doesn't work on 5g wifi which is crap
customer_reviews.author: missylu92

customer_reviews.title: This camera has everything I needed: remote monitoring and ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera has everything I needed: remote monitoring and controlling (it connects via wifi or wire to the router, can be monitored and controlled via phone app remotely), motion detection and real time notification, IR night vision, zoom in/out.
customer_reviews.author: Papaya Head

customer_reviews.title: WiFi doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago and now it won’t connnect to server wirelessly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must!
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera. My favorite part is we can be out of town and still watch our son through our phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable "security" camera
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple of months of use, the cameras keep going "off-line" at random times and for prolonged periods of time. In other words, this is not much of a security camera since it's VERY unreliable. Do NOT buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Solorio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The best product for the best price. Excellent at night!
customer_reviews.author: SUSSY

customer_reviews.title: Good if u don’t need volume.
customer_reviews.text: So I gave it three stars because the volume is always staticky and I had to buy a cheap volume monitor with it since the volume on this one sucked.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal barnes

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I can see at it anywhere I am. easy to use and has sound has no monitor but I use Ipad
customer_reviews.author: sr

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my child she sleeps by herself alone . So this camera will helps me to watch her . This produce is very to set up . Easy and simple . The shipment is very fast maybe it's because I am the prime mumber .
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using it for our so from the start he's 15 months now still great buy and love the app!!
customer_reviews.author: erin ferland

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase. Hubby got it to check on me throughout the day due to cardiac issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Keaghey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to watch my dog while I'm away, and I love it! The night vision and picture quality is great and it was very easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it; lack of reliability
customer_reviews.text: System software is not easy to use and problems are difficult to diagnose. Connectivity is spotty, we have to reset the unit on a very regular basis. We use it as a baby monitor and it causes more anxiety than needed. While it may be a deal, it is not worth the time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, as described. Daughter uses it for granddaughter, works great.
customer_reviews.author: jeff snyder

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this, wish i didn't have to have my phone out all night though to listen to the baby
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Kinosian

customer_reviews.title: Get better instructions
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the light went out and I can't reset this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still can’t get it to work
customer_reviews.text: The instructions and everything are in pretty broken English so it’s hard to understand anyway. But that aside, I work in IT and I cannot figure out how to make it work. Put your money into a better system.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Fielding

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it stays plugged into camera it can start a fire
customer_reviews.text: Used to monitor pets. Came un plugged and burned hole in carpet. Picture not clear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great baby camera
customer_reviews.text: We had this camera for two years, until our daughter ripped off the antenna. We loved it so much that we bought another one and installed it in a spot where she can't reach it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the deal is but I can't get the camera to pop up on the app about 80% of the time. The 20% of the time it kind of works I have to unplug/replug the camera in to get it to restart.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Down

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: The camera stop working, fails to detect wireless or connect to the app(after warranty expired). Useless camera. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Mani

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love this wireless camera. Use it to monitor my baby
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: its a little hard to connect and its a little hard to set up but once it works it works great
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Mireles

customer_reviews.title: The camera works, but is not user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I connected this the first time and it worked great. I got a new WIFI provider and with it came new equipment. Now I can not get it to connect. I gave up and now it's just sitting at the bottom of my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lamphier

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it works, easy to use and moves or pan. good price.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Picture extremely grainy. Didn’t work half the time. Makes a verrryyy loud noise when connecting to internet.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I’ve had this a year now and no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: brittany fortune

customer_reviews.title: Gives you peace of mind knowing you can see and hear what’s going on in your home!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for almost two years now and still works perfectly. Using the app when you are away from the house is real easy and works great, you can move it around and listen/talk very clearly.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright for the price, but wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: There is a delay on sound! Image freezes every now and then! And the app stops working often, you have to close and open it back up to get it to work again!
customer_reviews.author: YVONNE S

customer_reviews.title: Great to use as a baby camera
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a baby camera above the crib and works great for that. We plan to get another one for the second baby.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Luv dis camera by far the best camera for the money u paying I did buy order once Nd it didn’t work got a new one same problem but the one dat does work hands down great
customer_reviews.author: Edson depina

product_meta.title: LeFun Wireless Camera, Baby Monitor WiFi IP Surveillance Camera HD 720P Nanny Cam Video Recording with Pan Tilt Remote Motion Detect Two Way Audio and Night Vision
feature_bullets: WiFi CONNECTION With MULTIPLE USES: Without a specific display, you may use this wifi camera as a baby monitor to view your baby's activity and safety. No matter where you are, you can remote view the baby and control the wireless camera.

FULLY FUNCTIONAL AT ALL TIME: The 720P HD s provide you the best image and video. Using it for video recording, fast forward and playback via micro SD card. With Pan 350°/Tilt 100° and IR led Night Vision, you can view any angle of your home at any time.

STAY IN TOUCH WITH TWO WAY AUDIO: The built-in microphone and speaker allow voice communicating between the APP and camera side. This baby monitor have Intelligent Motion Alert, you can receive Message Alerts/Snapshots from App to ensure your baby safe.

EASY TO PLACE AND PLAY SYSTEM: Quick setup this wireless surveillance camera via 2.4G wifi, connected with your android, iOS, tablet and PC in minutes by using the MIPC. Begin to your seamlessly stream video and recorded video on this security camera.

SECURITY AND SUPPORT: Financial level Encryption Technology, make you connect to any devices, via a secure and safe network. All cameras have CE, FCC and RoHS certified. Full one-year Guarantee Repair provided, please contact us if you need assistance.
